# navigate to greens page
# select travel packs, toggle between single and double
# go back to monthly jar, select double
# the pricing reflects both the jar and travel pack selections
# !Screen Recording 2026-01-08 at 10.36.24 AM.mov|width=1622,height=1652,alt="Screen Recording 2026-01-08 at 10.36.24 AM.mov"!

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}

# the selector pricing should only reflect what is currently selected for the product (not monthly jar + travel packs, either or)
# ensure other PDPs do not have this issue

*Testing Requirements:*

unit tests
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Actual result:*

 adding monthly jar and travel packs together
{panel}

comments.author: Emily Mendelson
comments.body:
h2. Issue Summary

*Problem*: Customers are unable to attach vouchers during checkout, resulting in conversion loss. Error shows "Benefit Attachment failed" with ~3.4% error rate on vms-place-order trace since Aug 30, affecting FJ market.

*Root Cause*: Vouchers have a 2-plan attachment limit enforced by the vouchers service. The system is blocking checkout attempts because customers have pending plans in customer-plans-service preventing voucher attachment to new orders.

*Specific Example*:

*

Migrate Root.js from legacy code to modern React patterns
issues.description:
h2. Context
The {{Root.js}} file in the checkout flow is currently implemented as a class component using legacy Redux patterns. This makes it difficult to:
* Use modern React hooks
* Integrate with newer data-access patterns
* Maintain and test the component
* Apply modern best practices

h2. Current State
* *File*: {{app/spaces/whitelabel/modules/whitelabel-web/packages/libraries/store/src/checkout/Root.js}}
* *Implementation*: Class component with {{mapStateToProps}} and {{mapDispatchToProps}}
* *Redux*: Uses legacy Redux selectors and actions
* *Hooks*: Cannot use modern hooks like {{useGetCustomerSubscriptions}}, {{useHasOTPInCart}}, etc.

h2. Proposed Changes
1. *Convert to Functional Component*: Migrate from class component to functional component
2. *Modernize Data Fetching*: Replace Redux selectors with {{@/data-access}} hooks where applicable
3. *Use Modern Hooks*: Leverage React hooks for state management and side effects
4. *Improve Type Safety*: Add proper TypeScript types (convert from {{.js}} to {{.tsx}})
5. *Simplify Logic*: Refactor complex lifecycle methods into cleaner {{useEffect}} hooks

h2. Benefits
* Easier to maintain and extend
* Better integration with modern patterns used in other guards (e.g., {{FactorFormCheckoutGuard.tsx}})
* Improved type safety
* More testable code
* Consistent with current development standards

h2. Related Work
* This migration was identified during the implementation of GOC-3427 (OTP checkout fix)
* The current implementation works but uses patterns that are being phased out

h2. Acceptance Criteria
* [ ] {{Root.js}} is converted to a functional component ({{Root.tsx}})
* [ ] All class lifecycle methods are replaced with appropriate hooks
* [ ] Redux selectors are replaced with modern data-access hooks where possible
* [ ] Component maintains all existing functionality
* [ ] All existing tests pass
* [ ] New tests are added for any refactored logic
* [ ] No regressions in checkout flow

issues.summary: Introduce Meal Shake & Creatine to VMS assortment
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Overview:* 

We are aiming to add Meal Shake and Creatine products to the VMS offerings.

PRD with additional background: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eqT49tTHK2BG_RIUvEM_7uT6ShaeF5RSZuVP1zXtAFk/edit?tab=t.4w9mu9dyzkup|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1eqT49tTHK2BG_RIUvEM_7uT6ShaeF5RSZuVP1zXtAFk/edit?tab=t.4w9mu9dyzkup|smart-link] 
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Goals:* 

* Update All Products page to include 
** Meal Shake - Vanilla
** Meal Shake - Lemon
** Creatine - Unflavored
** Creatine - Peach Mango 
* Create a PDP for Creatine
* Create a PDP for Meal Shake  
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Resources:* 

Figma: [https://www.figma.com/design/bybh4HYm7NI8qgIRGZtnhp/Creatine---Meal-Shake-PDP-re-design?node-id=91-14341&t=5cqpKAcWpvIVi6jT-0|https://www.figma.com/design/bybh4HYm7NI8qgIRGZtnhp/Creatine---Meal-Shake-PDP-re-design?node-id=91-14341&t=5cqpKAcWpvIVi6jT-0|smart-link] 

Product Intake Forms: [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rxz1-lOki6j0_XBV73pmogQDjvcLhZQCf2p7XVqxjDo/edit?gid=1539850972#gid=1539850972|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rxz1-lOki6j0_XBV73pmogQDjvcLhZQCf2p7XVqxjDo/edit?gid=1539850972#gid=1539850972|smart-link] 

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y8IAysj0jpPYbNxi9DMHaSjafcMCplnpFiSoTicnUV4/edit?gid=840021641#gid=840021641|https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y8IAysj0jpPYbNxi9DMHaSjafcMCplnpFiSoTicnUV4/edit?gid=840021641#gid=840021641|smart-link] 

Tech Investigation for new products: [https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OpXwkZuJzFZQR3LC4bYf_VmI_rkvOMSXXNN3ICQuQeg/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.pux3nhnhqrt7|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OpXwkZuJzFZQR3LC4bYf_VmI_rkvOMSXXNN3ICQuQeg/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.pux3nhnhqrt7|smart-link] 
{panel}
